mapper.select: select itemId, addrDetail, yearly_monthly from listing where itemId=#{ITEMID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT deposit, MONTHLYFEE,DEPOSIT_WEB,MONTHLYFEE_WEB FROM WOLSELISTING where itemId = #{ITEMID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT YEARLYFEE, yearlyFee_web FROM JUNSAELISTING where itemId = #{ITEMID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
Select roomType From Roominfo where itemId = #{ITEMID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from (SELECT l.itemId, l.addrDetail, l.yearly_monthly, wl.deposit, wl.DEPOSIT_WEB, wl.MONTHLYFEE_WEB, wl.MONTHLYFEE, jl.YEARLYFEE, jl.yearlyFee_web, ri.roomType, '/assets/listing_images/' || l.itemId || '/1.png' AS itemImagePath FROM listing l LEFT JOIN WOLSELISTING wl ON l.itemId = wl.itemId LEFT JOIN JUNSAELISTING jl ON l.itemId = jl.itemId LEFT JOIN Roominfo ri ON l.itemid = ri.itemid) data)
where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
